main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified flying objects were reported in Phoenix, Arizona, on June 17, 1967.
interesting points: Witnesses included police officers with significant experience in reporting unusual aerial phenomena,The sightings lasted approximately 5 minutes and were characterized by a bright red revolving light,There was corroboration among several officers who independently reported the sightings,The object appeared to hover and move erratically over traffic patterns,There is a noted inconsistency in the duration of visibility compared to typical meteor observations.
witness description: police officers with varying years of experience
